title: Is This Our Favorite Folding Phone?
description:
As the year comes to an end, Marques and Andrew have a grab bag of news topics they discuss before they dive deeper into the new Oppo Find N folding phone. After that they discuss a new challenge that Marques is adding to his morning routine. This one flies by, but it's a fun one.

Links:
